title: Personal Portfolio Website using HTML & CSS
features: Designed and coded a responsive, media‑rich personal portfolio using semantic HTML5 and modular CSS, achieving cross‑browser compatibility and a 99% accessibility score.
Reduced average mobile load time from 3.2 s to 1.8 s by compressing images with ImageOptim and applying CSS best practices.
Integrated interactive elements and a video showcase, boosting average session duration by 45% according to web analytics.
